Label: Sample representativeness
question_text: If there was evidence of correlation or causation observed, was the sample on which it was observed representative of the broader population about which general conclusions are being made?

Label: Alternative explanation
question_text: How likely is your alternative explanation for the same evidence, as compared to the author’s explanation?
answer_text: Much more likely than the author’s

Label: Open to evidence
question_text: Does the author suggest in any way that further evidence might improve our understanding of the topics discussed in the passage?
